alert.note: Alert for Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; South Washington Coast; Willapa Hills (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 20 at 4:51PM PST until December 21 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Oregon, North Oregon Coast and Lower Columbia. In Washington, Willapa Hills, South Washington Coast and I- 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County. * WHEN...Until noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Visibilities will vary along Interstate 5 in southern Washington. Be prepared for sudden changes in visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; South Washington Coast; Willapa Hills
